Requirement.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('MegaPlayscape')); if(!isNULL(object)) { return false; } return true;

Attribute.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('MegaPlayscape')); if(!isNULL(object)) { var bonus = toString(Building::getArrangeBonus(object)); bonus = bonus+'%'; return bonus; } return ''

Attribute.name: progressPerc
Attribute.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('MegaPlayscape')); var bonus = Building::getArrangeBonus(object); var max = 20; return bonus/max;

Attribute.name: progressPerc
Attribute.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('JunkBase')); var bonus = Building::getArrangeBonus(object); var max = 20; return bonus/max;

Attribute.name: progressPerc
Attribute.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RuffianFort')); var bonus = Building::getArrangeBonus(object); var max = 20; return bonus/max;

Attribute.name: progressPerc
Attribute.formula: #program; var fort = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RuffianFort')); var piecesTotal = 5; var pieceHealth = toDouble(System::getConfigValue('__Homergeddon_Spreadsheet_Config:Forts:RuffianFort_DefenseHealth__')); var healthTotal = piecesTotal * pieceHealth; var damageDealt = 0; for(var i = 0;i < piecesTotal;i++) { var pieceDamage = ObjectVars::getVariableInt('Obj_RuffianFort', 'piece' + toString(i) + 'Damage'); damageDealt += pieceDamage; } return damageDealt/healthTotal;

#program; var fort = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RuffianFort')); var piecesTotal = 5; var damageDealt = 0; for(var i = 0;i < piecesTotal;i++) { var pieceDamage = ObjectVars::getVariableInt('Obj_RuffianFort', 'piece' + toString(i) + 'Damage'); damageDealt += pieceDamage; } return damageDealt;

Attribute.name: progressPerc
Attribute.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('MegaPlayscape')); var bonus = Building::getArrangeBonus(object); var max = 20; return bonus/max;

Attribute.name: progressPerc
Attribute.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('JunkBase')); var bonus = Building::getArrangeBonus(object); var max = 20; return bonus/max;

Attribute.name: progressPerc
Attribute.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RuffianFort')); var bonus = Building::getArrangeBonus(object); var max = 20; return bonus/max;
